name: Rachel Schwartzman
text: First time to this place! Pizza was pretty good! Staff were nice and pretty efficient. The knots aren't really worth the money in my opinion. (They are supposed to have pesto and cheese and 2/4 of them didn't have any)

name: Scot Morrison
text: Overall, a satisfying experience and it was exciting to see above average customer service. All staff were kind and courtesy, an exception to the rule. I was deeply satisfied with my pizza. The all-veggie was tasty! Good job too the afternoon crew! Cheers.

name: abbey eads
text: I am a blind person and felt very Unwelcomed. It was my first time   They asked me if that was enough sauce and I said, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm blind, do you mind putting it closer to the glass so I can see‚Äù the guy barely moved it And I said I still can‚Äôt ‚Ä¶More

name: Aaron Miller
text: The 4 pizzas We ordered were okay, but the Ovalini salad was inedible. It was all basil leaves, a few cherry tomatoes, and a some dollops of cheese. Straight basil is a little much. No lettuce or anything else. No dressing at all included. The mozzarella cheese had the consistency of cottage cheese. It was about 8 dollars.

name: Marta S
text: Loved this location! We visited blaze pizza a lot and we came across this one on our way to LA. Wow, staff was super friendly and the manager was THE BEST! She was making sure all customers had their orders ready as soon as possible, asked ‚Ä¶More

name: Kevin Clarno
text: great pizza not too bad in price but sometimes they burn it so if they burn ask them to make a new one except last time they didn't do it for me that's why they only got four stars

name: Samantha Hendricks
text: Very good pizza. Smaller than expected but very good flavor.

name: Paikan Schouten
text: These guys are awesome apparently we ordered from the wrong place and the still took my order after closing.  Dylan was amazing he still took my order after closing always been a fan of blaze but the Dylan just made me a customer for life!

name: Daddy Daddy
text: Simply just slow a f. Like the place is disastrous

name: Abhinuv Pitale
text: Great food. Try the cauliflower crust.

name: Krissy Fagan
text: I have so many food restrictions it makes eating so difficult, and eating out I just dont do. My husband wanted pizza so I thought about Blaze's gluten free crust and thought maybe. Dillon helped us, he was so amazing it almost made me cry ‚Ä¶More

name: Lori Sortino
text: Always yummy and made to order.  And so quick, unlike another pizza place in North Paso that we used to go to that took an hour to get your pizza!

name: Richard Reed
text: I would have loved to give a 5 star but...I got a S'mores instead of my brownie

name: Matthew McPhail
text: I love this place. Great prices for a custom pizza. Unlimited fresh toppings, CAULIFLOWER crust, and service with a smile‚Äîall I need. Loving the crust options. I highly recommend the cauliflower crust. The keto crust is a bit too soft for me. I like a crunch. Drink selection and dough knots are also bomb. Will def be back.

name: Michelle B
text: Really good pizza and an even better (shorter) wait time. Family friendly, loads of options, gluten free and allergy sensitive options available as well.

name: Kate Oreilly
text: Great pizza. Make your own veg. Yumm

name: Andrew Bradbury
text: Ordered a vegan pizza online for pickup and found some bacon and a weird burnt I don't know what?? Maybe it was an onion that just got toasted and thrown on the pizza but after I found the bacon I was not about to chance it. Really bummed bc I love blaze and now I'm done eating there.

name: Kelly Simmons
text: Nice that you can pick your own toppings, but I thought they were a bit chinsy with them. Crust was very good, sauce not so much.

name: Jordan Freedman
text: This location was SUPER busy! The wait was a little longer because of it, but the staff was still super friendly and attentive... and the food was as good as ever.

name: Barbara Reeger
text: Love this place but they need to change there gloves everytime time they handle food to money or boxes.

name: Kimberly
text: Love the make your own pizza option with tons of toppings and cheese types to select from including vegan options.  Gluten-free crusts available.  Great place to go with kids as everyone can have their own pizza with their own toppings for around ten bucks (or under) per head.

name: Amy Bowen
text: The food is good and they just started using online orders which kind of slows you order down. We stood in line for about 25 minutes while the three servers made about 12 pizza's before even taking our order. The idea is nice, they just ‚Ä¶More

name: Rachel Romo
text: So.. It‚Äôs my second time there, I still never knew the bathroom was there. Between the ordering and paying, I think patrons are feeling like they are flying solo, like junior high-dance-awkward. I had to fiddle with pamphlets to hold my ‚Ä¶More

name: Bernabe Aguilera
text: The employees were  slow and unorganized.  Several employees were just standing around and not doing much. They were short on many ingredients and their ingredients where getting mixed with others in their trays.  I do not recommend this store to anyone.

name: Daniel Nolan
text: Good food but a long wait at lunch time. Very slow. Don't go if you're in a hurry

name: K Mabry
text: After I made my pizza the pizzeria "students" did not like putting anything extra on the pizzas they said after each topping "is that it, " I had to keep telling them no I want blah blah blah and they would look at me like "really" then ‚Ä¶More

name: Sallee Jordan
text: It was different from other piece of person that went to but it was nice quick. The pizza are like pan pizza size so you probably need a pizza per person. When you add up all the topping to make it taste really great then you would think would be better to get a regular 16 in pizza. I would definitely eat there again

name: Alissa Bright
text: Perfect size for sharing a build-your-own pizza with a toddler.  Get the Blaze app to start earning rewards- free drinks, free desserts, and you can build up enough points (flames) for a free pizza! ‚Ä¶More

text: Never had a bad pizza there. The only thing was all the booths we're dirty and I had to clean my own.

name: Luis Guzman
text: Good, affordable fast Mexican style food with some healthy options.

name: j m
text: Delivered the wrong food to me.  Called them to let them know and can't even get through to anyone!  Line states "technical difficulties" for over 2 weeks.  What a joke.

name: Christina Gragg
text: I was working on my paperwork in your seating area before you were to open ..Would have left 1+ hrs before opening and your female employee just told me that I had 10 mins...What is that type of behavior saying to me???A reminder that I ‚Ä¶More

name: Norma Haynes
text: First time here. They have only 1 size pizza you pick the fresh toppings or add to their menu choices, kinda like a subway sandwich store. From order to table about 9 minutes. Fresh flavors, nice thin crust,fire pizza oven. Also beer and beverages, salads ,desert. Clean dining room, and bathroom.  I recommend it for a quick bite.

name: Zachary Brewster
text: Nice cashier's tipped them 5$ but realized that the pizzas that they gave me were really small wish i would have went to the other Blaze Pizza

name: Carol Thornton
text: Customize the heck out of your pie. So many fresh and flavorful options. Bright and warm atmosphere, accommodating, helpful FRIENDLY staff.  Best bang for the buck. May be lines out the door tho. Haha

name: Jo Whipp
text: I love the cheese. Fun to create your own pizza. Also, Blaze cares that their company pays everyone a fair wage. Not my favorite beer or wine choices. They do carry 805 on tap.

name: Sean Walter
text: Ordered some pizzas for delivery and had to laugh at the topping situation. Let's just say that there was an average of about 2 pieces of pineapple per piece and maybe 1 jalapeno. Food arrived cold as well but that seems to be the delivery company and not Blaze. The crust made up for the lack of toppings though.

name: Christopher Gray
text: I like Blaze. It's a simplified way to order; just pick your toppings and shortly after out pops you pizza. I always get their thin crust but they also have a cauliflower crust and a keto crust. And when I deserve a treat, they have cookies and brownies that they can pop in their wood fired oven and warm for you.

name: Rudi Limich
text: We love the options and the quality. Super excited they now have Cauliflower crust!!!! Never disappointed!

name: Christine Loewen
text: Love this place. Love choosing our own ingredients for each pizza. Price is Right also.

text:
This place has great pizza.

However, the delivery service is unreliable. I received my order 3 hours after I ‚Ä¶More

text: My first time trying Blaze Pizza. Everything was nice & clean, the food looked very fresh,  & the pre made salads looked fantastic! They had 3 salads to choose from,  ceaser,  arugula & berry,  and another type with chev cheese,  dried ‚Ä¶More

name: Jenness Bowling
text: So many options for meat lovers and veggie lovers alike! The facilities were very clean and everyone begin the counter was friendly. I ordered a veggie pizza with vegan cheese and the new vegan chorizo. It was perfectly cooked and settled well. It's always a treat to go to Blaze Pizza

text: This place is so impressive. Everything is fresh. Everyone is friendly. You get your pizza so quickly and it's DELICIOUS. The prices are the best I've seen for such high quality pizza. I highly recommend!

name: feelGood Phil
text: I really enjoy getting a good size pizza to myself. But even better I can load the extra toppings without any additional charges. Flat rate for totally customizable pizza.

name: Crystal Harris
text: I was very excited to get the choice of vegan cheese on my pizza. The topping choices are very awesome. I'm sure it'll get better.

name: mike enger
text: Both stars are for the employees who know and do their job. The sausage however .... not sure ... not meat. Very greasy pizza , they don‚Äôt have plates and all pizzas are one size. No exaggeration, I‚Äôve recently had better pizza at a gas station.

text: Love love love this place. The fact that you can put as Mony toppings as you want on a pizza and not wind up with a $30 medium pizza is amazing. $9 no matter what you put on. Kid friendly and great service.

name: Bryce Griffith
text: The subway for pizza. Blaze is a great idea and very well executed. The build your own pizza is the way to go. You can choose everything from sauce to toppings, even the dough. I really enjoy coming here, the only reason I didn't give it five stars is that it doesn't have fast service.

name: waylon brunsell
text: Love the Blaze.  Cheap and delicious.  Half salad half pizza.  Perfect for dinner.  As much toppings as you want and cheese.

name: Jeff Richard
